The eight stains [an8.15:3.6]: Not reciting is the stain of hymns.
Neglect is the stain of houses.
Laziness is the stain of beauty.
Bad, unskillful qualities are a stain in this world and the next.
Ignorance is the worst stain of all.
The eight stains (repeated) [an8.15:3.6]: Not reciting is the stain of hymns.
The stain of houses is neglect.
Laziness is the stain of beauty.
Bad qualities are a stain in this world and the next.
But a worse stain than these is ignorance, the worst stain of all.
